channel.title: Client loading error?

item.title: Client loading error?
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

added auto cache but when i tried to load up the client (not jar client)
it gives me this error?

2zppgck.png984×611

but when i put the cache, sprites, signlink, etc and the jar inside a separate folder it loads?

293aloh.png1047×367

this is my findcache directory code

public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = {"c:/"}; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = "ancientxcache"; for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try { String s1 = as[i]; if(s1.length() > 0) { File file = new File(s1); if(!file.exists()) continue; } File file1 = new File(s1 + s); if(file1.exists() || file1.mkdir()) return s1 + s + "/"; } catch(Exception _ex) { } return null; }

Read full topic
